text:
"Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi" is an American animated TV show made by Mike Young that started on November 19, 2004 and ended on June 27th, 2006.
Characters.
The show is loosely based on Puffy AmiYumi, with cartoon versions of them as the main characters. Ami was voiced by Janice Kawaye and Yumi was voiced by Grey DeLisle.
